title: Fresh
text:
Photo: Desmond Boylan, Associated Press Image 1 of / 2 Caption
Close
Image 1 of 2 Grammy-winning Cuban pianist Chucho Valdes acknowledges the crowd during a perfromance at Cathedral Square in Havana, Cuba, Friday, Oct. 9, 2015. The concert by the Cuban National Orchestra, featuring Valdes, Chinese pianist Lang Lang, and American violinist and conductor Marin Alsop, is part of celebrations marking the capital's 500th anniversary. (AP Photo/Desmond Boylan) Grammy-winning Cuban pianist Chucho Valdes acknowledges the crowd during a perfromance at Cathedral Square in Havana, Cuba, Friday, Oct. 9, 2015. The concert by the Cuban National Orchestra, featuring Valdes, ... more Image 2 of 2 Chucho Valdes performs at the SFJazz Center in San Francisco, from Thursday, Oct. 29, to Nov. 1. Chucho Valdes performs at the SFJazz Center in San Francisco, from Thursday, Oct. 29, to Nov. 1. Photo: Cindy Byrum Fresh 1  /  2 Back to Gallery Music
Chucho Valdés & Irakere , Green Music Center, Rohnert Park (Sun., Oct. 25); Rio Theater , Santa Cruz (Tue.); SFJazz Center (Thurs.-Sun., Nov. 1).
